products.name: Traditional Water Pot
products.description: Handcrafted water pot made from locally sourced Kutch clay, featuring traditional geometric patterns. Each piece is shaped on a foot-powered wheel by Kumbhar artisans and fired using traditional methods.

products.name: Khavda Decorative Vase
products.description: Hand-thrown decorative vase from Khavda village, featuring the region's distinctive white and black motifs on natural terracotta. Perfect as a standalone decorative piece or for dried arrangements.

products.name: Kutch Coffee Mug Set
products.description: Set of four handcrafted coffee mugs made by master potters from Lodai village. Each mug features traditional Kutch designs with natural mineral pigments and a food-safe glaze interior.

products.name: Terracotta Dinner Plates
products.description: Set of six dinner plates handcrafted from Kutch clay. These plates feature minimalist design with subtle rim detailing, finished with food-safe natural glazes. Microwave and dishwasher safe.

products.name: Decorative Diya Set
products.description: Set of five hand-painted diyas (oil lamps) made by Kutch artisans. Each piece features traditional motifs representing prosperity and light, perfect for festivals or year-round home decor.

products.name: Serving Bowl with Lid
products.description: Handcrafted serving bowl with matching lid, featuring fish and geometric motifs that symbolize abundance. Made from local Kutch clay and finished with food-safe glazes.

products.name: Decorative Wall Plates
products.description: Set of three decorative wall plates featuring intricate hand-painted designs inspired by Kutch's natural landscape. Each plate comes with a discreet hanging fixture on the back.

products.name: Miniature Animal Figurines
products.description: Set of five miniature animal figurines handcrafted by Kutch potters. These charming pieces represent local wildlife and domestic animals, traditionally made as children's toys but perfect as decorative items.

products.name: Spice Container Set
products.description: Traditional spice container set with six small pots and lids arranged on a matching tray. Each piece is handcrafted from Kutch clay and features minimalist design with natural earth tones.

products.name: Kutch Soup Bowls
products.description: Set of four deep soup bowls handcrafted by Kumbhar artisans. These bowls feature traditional Kutch patterns on the exterior with a smooth, glazed interior perfect for hot soups and stews.

products.name: Large Floor Vase
products.description: Statement floor vase handcrafted by master potters from Khavda village. Standing at 24 inches tall, this impressive piece features traditional geometric patterns and is perfect for entryways or living spaces.

products.name: Terracotta Planter Set
products.description: Set of three graduated terracotta planters handcrafted by Kutch artisans. Each features drainage holes and hand-painted traditional motifs that represent growth and prosperity, perfect for indoor plants.
